name: TextNodeTest
description: Unit tests for the TextNode class in the Jsoup library, focusing on various text manipulation and validation functionalities.

test_cases.name: testBlank
test_cases.description: Tests the isBlank functionality of the TextNode to check if the text node is blank.

test_cases.name: testTextBean
test_cases.description: Tests the text extraction and manipulation functionalities of the TextNode.

test_cases.name: testSplitText
test_cases.description: Tests the splitText functionality of the TextNode to split the text node at a specified position.

test_cases.name: testSplitAnEmbolden
test_cases.description: Tests the splitText and wrap functionalities of the TextNode to split and wrap the text node with a bold tag.

test_cases.name: testSplitTextValidation
test_cases.description: Tests the validation of the splitText functionality of the TextNode to ensure it throws exceptions for invalid offsets.

test_cases.name: testWithSupplementaryCharacter
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of supplementary characters in the TextNode.

test_cases.name: testLeadNodesHaveNoChildren
test_cases.description: Tests that TextNode instances do not have child nodes.

test_cases.name: testSpaceNormalise
test_cases.description: Tests the normalization of spaces in the TextNode.

test_cases.name: testClone
test_cases.description: Tests the cloning functionality of the TextNode to ensure cloned instances are independent.

test_cases.name: testCloneAfterAttributesHit
test_cases.description: Tests the cloning functionality of the TextNode after accessing attributes to ensure cloned instances are independent.

test_cases.name: testHasTextWhenIterating
test_cases.description: Tests the presence of text in TextNode instances when iterating through elements.

test_cases.name: createFromEncoded
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a TextNode from encoded text.

test_cases.name: normaliseWhitespace
test_cases.description: Tests the normalization of whitespace in a string.

test_cases.name: stripLeadingWhitespace
test_cases.description: Tests the stripping of leading whitespace from a string.

test_cases.name: leafNodeAttributes
test_cases.description: Tests various attribute-related functionalities of the TextNode.
